Appendix

User Manual
Not required on mark scheme but sample web has this part. might be better with a video

User Log in

You can either log in as an Ocularist or an Admins.
There are 3 default ocularist accounts with log in detail as following:
Username = Ocularist1 Password = t3am19_123
Username = Ocularist2 Password = t3am19_123
Username = Ocularist3 Password = t3am19_123
passwords are same for all 3 accounts
you can also log in as an admin: (username+password tbc)

My Rota Page

My rota page display current date schedule as default.
At the right hand side of the page, you can select to display schedules of another dates. You can click on patient's name and appointment ID on the timetable to see full patient's information(second slide) and appointment details(third slide) seperately. You can also click on add appointment button at a free slot to add in appointments.

Previous Next

Team Rota Page

You can view all your teammates'current date schedules.
To view schedules in another date, select a date at the datetime picker.
Similar to my rota, you can access appointment details by clicking corresponding buttons on timetables.
Only admins can assign appointments to teammates.(not sure)

Patient Page

Patient and waitlist page shows you all current patients
You can filter patients by search their names etc. You can update a patient's information(slide 2),delete a existing patient and add new patient(slide 3) at this page by clicking corresponding buttons.

Previous Next

Appointment Page

Appointment page shows all existing appointments.
You can search and filter appointments at search sections. You can also update,delete or add new appointments
